required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Biomarker Study for Prediction of aGVHD
clinical_study.official_title: Biomarker Identification for aGVHD After Allogeneic Stem Cell Transplantation: a Multiple Center Study

lead_sponsor.agency: Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

clinical_study.source: Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective study in patients receiving allogeneic stem cell transplantation. The blood samples on Day-14, -7, 0 and every 7 days until D100 were collected together with clinical data. In the final analysis, cytokines and biomarkers analysis will be carried out and compared between patients in No aGVHD and grade II-IV aGVHD.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a prospective study, observation study in patients receiving allogeneic stem cell transplantation in 4 BMT centers in Shanghai. The blood samples (on Day-14, -7, 0 and every 7 days until D100) and clinical data will be collected. In the final analysis, a panel of cytokines and biomarkers analysis of serial blood samples will be carried out and compared between patients with no aGVHD and grade II-IV aGVHD.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 100 days after allogeneic stem cell tansplantation
primary_outcome.description: clinical diagnosis and grade of aGVHD

study_pop.textblock: patients received allogeneic stem cell transplantation

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- all patients undergoing allogeneic stem cel transplantation
- with informed consent
- patients survived without aGVHD or relapse and patients with development of grade II-IV aGVHD
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients with blood sample and clinical data not available

facility.name: Blood & Marrow Transplantation Center, RuiJin Hospital

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine
responsible_party.investigator_title: Deputy director, department of hematology, Rui Jin Hospital
